root.text: Sudden drooping face, weakness on one side or speech disorder?

sofort.text:
⚠️ Suspected stroke (FAST):
• Face: smile → drooping corner?
• Arms: raise both → one drifts down?
• Speech: slurred or missing?
• Time: call 112 immediately.

To-dos:
1. Reassure, do not leave alone.
2. Note symptom onset time.
3. No food or drink.

fast.text:
FAST quick check:
F – Face asymmetry?
A – Arm drift?
S – Speech disturbed?
T – Time: if yes → call 112 now.

unsicher.text: If in doubt ALWAYS call 112 and describe the symptoms. Stroke is time-critical.

ende.text: No current stroke suspicion. If symptoms recur: act immediately.
